entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 02:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow changing to snow in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
